Package: grails.doc.gradle

[Groovy] Class MigrateLegacyDocs

      • grails.doc.gradle.MigrateLegacyDocs

      • Gradle task for migrating Grails 1.x gdocs to the newer Grails 2.x form with a YAML-based table of contents.
